column3:
“Update:
Balanced Clearheaded High ! 

BUDS appear more Indica than it's alleged Sativa leanings. 

Buds are DARK Green with Yellowish outlines and amazingly enough it has Golden-Orange Pistils that appear melted like candle wax or silk or cobwebs. Their color is literally a Golden like the Sun Orange with a silky sheen...and melted 

Aroma is best described as I'm smelling 90's Weed"

column1: Kind of makes you dumb (I don'...”"

column3: “Excellent sativa! Makes you giggly and is an great choice for being in social situations!”

“This is a very social, fun and uplifting smoke. The taste is great and the high is even better. I went with friends to look at houses for sale. Thank God we had a really mellow and laid back realtor. I just couldn't seem to stop talking and laughing for just about any reason. This strain would be perfect for parties or just getting out to do things. There is a slight body relaxing element, but the sativa shines throu...”

“Lemon Pie is a great sativa... total head high... I looked on Leafly to see what the rating of the strain was and saw a 3.8!  How could this be?  Lemon Pie deserves a much higher rating!  I deal with bad anxiety and Lemon Pie made me relax and I felt completely uplifted.  It's a total upper, definitely a day time strain.  Great smell, great flavor. All around great sativa.”
“Got this in concentrate form and honestly smells damn lemon like, and tastes slightly like lemon heads. I would recommend”
“Sugarwax smells and tastes like lemon meringue pie amazing”
“I've never smoked the flower but the concentrates of Lemon pie is absolutely amazing.”

“out of all the strains my girlfriend and I have smoked, this one is by far our favorite and it’s honestly the highest I’ve ever been thank the lord jesus for growing this naturally!  Kumbayaaaaaa < if you get that you da best!”
“I've never smoked the flower but the concentrates of Lemon pie is absolutely amazing.”

“Only gave three stars because it was super dry and burned way too fast.  I think I paid mainly for the name attached to the strain rather than the quality of the flower itself. I'd only buy this again in a pinch.”
“Really good for running. Very clear buzz. No couch lock or heavy feeling. Very energetic high. Positive and clean feeling. I like it for exercising.”
“smoking this strain right now and very very impressed by the taste and the high”

“This is good stuff.  Lately my tolerance has been through the roof but this one had me feeling exremely happy and incredibly horny.  Slight citrus flavor with some sweetness but it's kinda tough to nail down.  
 It'd be wonderful if this one stayed around here for a while because I'd definitely buy it again when I run out which looks like that'll be real soon because this is really good.”
“Two words to describe this strain: video games. Lol.”
“Had this strain from a nearby dispensary and I was amazed by how creative and energetic it made me feel.”
“So tasty! Talkative and energetic”

“This is good stuff.  Lately my tolerance has been through the roof but this one had me feeling exremely happy and incredibly horny.  Slight citrus flavor with some sweetness but it's kinda tough to nail down.  
 It'd be wonderful if this one stayed around here for a while because I'd definitely buy it again when I run out which looks like that'll be real soon because this is really good.”

“Only gave three stars because it was super dry and burned way too fast.  I think I paid mainly for the name attached to the strain rather than the quality of the flower itself. I'd only buy this again in a pinch.”
“Two words to describe this strain: video games. Lol.”
“I'm so glad this is the first real high I've ever had. I know I've never been high like this, and I don't think this will be easy to beat.”
“So tasty! Talkative and energetic”
“All I have to say,  is watch what you say when smoking this strain. It makes words come out for no reason lol.”
“The smell is divine. Lemon cream pie! Taste is nice. High is very mellow. Good daytime med, doesn't get you too amped at all. Overall very nice.”

“Mellow and open. That's how I feel...  
light and airy would also describe this strain. Props to Uncle!”
“Just picked this bad boy up. It smells very potent with the citurs.”

“This strain was uplifting and energetic! From first opening the container you get an immediate smell of citrus and well lemons. The nuggs were right and dense and had a wonderful taste. I would recommend this to anyone who wanted to go out opposed to sitting relaxing”

“Holy fuck the high I received from this strain has yet to be beaten by any other strain; solely based on the crazy euphoria I received from it. I have no idea why the euphoria rating is so low but that needs to change.”
“Lived up to expectations.  Love the smell and noticeable lemon taste.  The best social”

“This for me is a light strain. It is mostly a light cerebral high.This is not crazy buzzy but it does make you happy, warning it does give the crazy munchies. It has a wonderful lemon smell. The buds are gorgeous with nice orange hair through out the green bud.”
“decent but there's way better lemon out there”

“Nice fresh flavor. I got a gentle, fresh lemon taste but not much else. Moderate strength. I found the high to be so clear and somewhat generic that I didn't feel high enough and smoked through this faster than other strains.”

“I am very disappointed. Got it as a shatter and  I almost couldn't feel any effect. Gave it 2 stars for nice retail packaging with Leafs by Snoop". It is hard to believe that this could be ever approved by a Master himself.”"
“It was on special really cheap @FZT so I bought an eighth and was sourly" disappointed  (sorry
column5: heh).  Perhaps I just got a bad bunch
column6: not sure though because this was my first time trying it.  Everything about it was weak: the smell
column8: even the high was barely noticeable
column9: which for me is unacceptable.  I wish I hadn't been lured in by the low price deal.  Definitely will not be buyi...”"

column3:
“Grading scale: 1st 20 min & Leveled out. 
One Hit High Duration: 2hrs
Pain Management: 9 for 2hrs
Rate your effects 1-10 below:
Lightheaded 1 to 10 Drunken spins 
( 4 ) - ( 2 )
Mentally Drifting 1 to 10 Mentally Creative: 
( 8 ) - ( 7 )
Alert 1 to 10 Sleepy: ( 3 ) - ( 2 ) 
Come Down Sleepy 1-10: 2
Calm 1 to 10 Anxiously paranoid: 
 ( 3 ) - ( 2 )
Fidgety 1 to 10 Case of the Shakes: 
 ( 2 ) - ( 1 )
Coordinated 1 to 10 ...”
